feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Flood Advisory issued September 02 at 9:09AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: .Heavy rainfall over the past week has elevated river levels on the Little Susitna River into bankfull conditions with lowland overflows in homes along the river near Houston. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 AM AKDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...The following area, Little Susitna River near Houston.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 12:39PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...ELEVATED WATER LEVELS EXPECTED FOR KUSKOKWIM DELTA COAST TONIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY NIGHT... TONIGHT`S THREAT: Persistent west-southwesterly flow today into tonight coinciding with high tide and higher seas could raise water levels 1 to 2 feet above normal highest tide, especially between Newtok and Kipnuk.
